verbs.description: With the Tuesday summit in Singapore between President Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un just around the corner , a flurry of planning , negotiating , strategizing and perhaps even a bit of [ARG1: finger] - [V: crossing] is underway .

[ARGM-ADV: With the Tuesday summit in Singapore between President Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un just around the corner] , [ARG1: a flurry of planning , negotiating , strategizing and perhaps even a bit of finger - crossing] [V: is] [ARG2: underway] .
